mdRecord.dcterms:title: Street Scene with Mexican-American Children, Southwest United States, ca. 1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph shows two Mexican-American children posed for the camera in the street of a southwestern town. Though the location is unknown, it is believed to be in Texas, Arizona, or New Mexico ca 1893 A wagon and adobe/thatch homes are to their left, while wooden town buildings are in the distance behind them. Image slightly faded to yellowish brown. Circular spots are on the photo at right and left
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
